CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name , "Post Case Survey", "http://Solutionreach.Customer-Experience-Survey.sgizmo.com/s3/?surveyid="&Id, "Playbook Case Survey", "http://Solutionreach.Onboarding-Survey.sgizmo.com/s3/?surveyid="&Id,"http://Solutionreach.Customer-Experience-Survey.sgizmo.com/s3/?surveyid="&Id)
CustomField.label: Survey Link
